mapper.select: select c.*, u.nickname, u.avatar_url from tb_comment as c left join tb_user as u on c.user_id = u.id where c.article_id = #{articleId} and deleted = 0 order by c.id desc
select c.*, u.nickname, u.avatar_url from tb_comment as c left join tb_user as u on c.user_id = u.id where c.user_id = #{currentUserId} and deleted = 0 order by c.id desc

select c.id,c.user_id,u.nickname,c.content,c.time,c.article_id from tb_comment as c left join tb_user as u on c.user_id = u.id left join tb_article as t on c.article_id = t.id
and c.content like concat('%',#{content},'%')
and c.user_id = #{userId}
and c.deleted = 0
order by c.time desc
